attributes.action: Create grants available for young entrepreneur`s who can`t find the money to start business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe all young people between 18-30 should have the chance at running there own business if they do wish to choose. At the moment there is only help for those unemployed i.e. princes trust. But those working and with families cannot find the funds to start off going it alone. grants of upto £2000
